feature_name: Entering minutes for a board meeting

user_story.i_want: enter minutes for past board meetings
user_story.so_that: keep records of the business transacted at board meetings

givens_list: I am the Secretary of the co-op
no minutes for the past board meeting have been entered yet
whens_list: I go to the Board page
I follow "Enter minutes for this meeting" for the past board meeting
I enter minutes for the board meeting
I choose the Directors who were in attendance
I press "Save these minutes"
I follow "View minutes" for the board meeting
thens_list: I should see "Minutes have not been entered for this meeting yet" for the past board meeting
I should be on the Board page
I should see the minutes I entered
I should see the participants I chose

givens_list: I am the Secretary of the co-op
minutes have been entered for the meeting
whens_list: I go to the Board page
I follow "View minutes" for the board meeting
I follow "Edit these minutes"
I edit the minutes
I press "Save these minutes"
I follow "View minutes" for the board meeting
thens_list: I should see the edited minutes
